title: Grateful Dead Live at Greek Theatre, University Of California on 1981-09-11
lineage: Master Cassettes (Nakamichi CR7-A) > Tascam DA-3000 (DSF 1-bit/5.6 MHz)> dBpoweramp (24/96) > Adobe Audition CC 2019 > TLH flac2496
source: Mark Severson's Master (FOB) Audience Cassettes; 3 x Nakamichi 700 mics (cardioid left & right - X pattern; 80 degree angle; 6db bass EQ, omni center pointed straight at stage, 45' from stage, DFC) > Jamie Poris' custom made mixer > Sony D5
